Title: Lady Heather's Box
Plot: Grissom's investigation into the murder of two men leads him to a new encounter with Lady Heather. Catherine is desperate to discover what lead to the near-death of her daughter and why her ex-husband disappeared.
Writer: Carol Mendelsohn, Andrew Lipsitz, Eli Talbert, Naren
GuestStars: Melinda Clarke, Michael Riley, Amy Pietz, Elizabeth Berkley, Timothy Carhart, Pauley Perrette, Samuel Ball, Shayne Anderson, Kata Dobo, David Fogg, Tomiko Fraser, Rib Hillis, P.B. Hutton, Sandra McCoy, Alimi Balla
